 2. Embedding Generation: Converting text chunks into embeddings
 3. Vector Database Integration: Storing embeddings in a vector database (e.g., FAISS)
 4. Retrieval System: Implementing relevant document finding
 5. RAG Layer: Combining retrieval with LLM responses"},{"type":"text","text":"
